name: Exam Game (cdtran)
description:
Exam Game

Aim the tank with the mouse and hold left button to shoot.

Turn on wind for a greater challenge.

Turn on Lindsay-mode for a lesser challenge. In this mode you can trigger a Cluster-Bomb by by pressing space.

Destroy the enemy tank before running out of ammo to win.

Use 1-9 (and 0) keys to auto-switch between levels:

  1. Default
  2. Black Holes
  3. Homing Missiles
  4. Shield
  5. Moving Bouncy Barriers
  6. Cluster Bomb
  7. Laser Web
  8. Cinemachine & Minions
  9. Free Choice (not implemented in this demo, just repeats level 1)
  10. Free Choice (not implemented in this demo, just repeats level 1)

Press R to reload the current level.

Press Q to return to main menu at any time.

SFX/Music from 

  • Party Golf by George Begbie: http://www.georgebegbie.com/

GFX originally sourced from (some edited/adpated):

  • Background/platforms: Brackeys https://brackeysgames.itch.io/date-night
  • Rick & Morty Portal: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/Vg18zb
  • GUI resources: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/gui-kit-the-stone-116852
  • Font: Fredoka One, Google Fonts
  • Tank spritesheet and background images by Kenney from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tanks and https://www.kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux used under CC0 Public Domain license.
